PageWidgetPortable.Title: Estruturas Onde Ã© Utilizado
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>PR_ESTRUTURASONDESEUSA.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN ( SELECT A1.HANDLE FROM PR_ESTRUTURAS A1,PD_PRODUTOS B WHERE (A1.PRODUTO = @CAMPO(CODIGOREFERENCIA)) AND A1.VARIACAOPRODUTO = @CAMPO(HANDLE) AND (A1.DATAFINAL > @AGORA) AND (B.HANDLE = A1.PRODUTO) AND B.TIPO <> 3)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
